FuncDef: The reset sma statistics command deletes SMA protocol packet statistics on an AER.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before you collect SMA protocol packet statistics within a specified period of time on an AER, run the reset sma statistics command to delete existing SMA protocol packet statistics. Then run the display sma statistics command to view newly collected SMA protocol packet statistics.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
Configuration Impact
After the reset sma statistics command is run, all SMA protocol packet statistics are deleted. Confirm your operation before you determine to delete the statistics.
